ygData.subject: RE: Stein Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That is because the Ogre is a Paladin. Go figure, an Ogre Paladin. So is the female Barbarian next to him. So, if you are a DE and are NOT Agnostic, you
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:50 PM 11/30/99 -0600, you wrote:

> > Every time I did it I gave all the ingredients to him at once. As a
> high elf, I never had a problem with the ogre, who actually cons better
> to me than the barkeep does. Aren't factions screwy things?
>That's because he is an ogre outcast. He was hated in Oggok and shunned,
>because he was too smart. The barbarian saved him from Guk when he was
>young, though, and they have been friends since. He is not quite a
>typical ogre. I'm not sure exactly what faction he is, but he hates
>Enchanters in Ogre form. : ) And DE form.

That is because the Ogre is a Paladin. Go figure, an Ogre Paladin.
So is the female Barbarian next to him. So, if you are a DE and are NOT
Agnostic, you will have real trouble completing this quest.


>
>
>Eltanin Soulblade, Enchanter, Mith Marr
>Saidan Soulblade, Paladin, Mith Marr
>
>James Meyer
><mailto:jamesm@...>jamesm@...
